              hither
               
              in
               
              a
               
              most
               
              unlucky
               
              hour

speaker: MARTIUS
text:
To
               
              find
               
              thy
               
              brother
               
              Bassianus
               
              dead
              .

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
My
               
              brother
               
              dead
              !
               
              I
               
              know
               
              thou
               
              dost
               
              but
               
              jest
              .

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
He
               
              and
               
              his
               
              lady
               
              both
               
              are
               
              at
               
              the
               
              lodge

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Upon
               
              the
               
              north
               
              side
               
              of
               
              this
               
              pleasant
               
              chase
              .

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
’Tis
               
              not
               
              an
               
              hour
               
              since
               
              I
               
              left
               
              them
               
              there
              .

speaker: MARTIUS
text:
We
               
              know
               
              not
               
              where
               
              you
               
              left
               
              them
               
              all
               
              alive
              ,

speaker: MARTIUS
text:
But
              ,
               
              out
               
              alas
              ,
               
              here
               
              have
               
              we
               
              found
               
              him
               
              dead
              .

speaker: TAMORA
text:
Where
               
              is
               
              my
               
              lord
               
              the
               
              King
              ?

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Here
              ,
               
              Tamora
              ,
               
              though
               
              grieved
               
              with
               
              killing
               
              grief
              .

speaker: TAMORA
text:
Where
               
              is
               
              thy
               
              brother
               
              Bassianus
              ?

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Now
               
              to
               
              the
               
              bottom
               
              dost
               
              thou
               
              search
               
              my
               
              wound
              .

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Poor
               
              Bassianus
               
              here
               
              lies
               
              murderèd
              .

speaker: TAMORA
text:
Then
               
              all
               
              too
               
              late
               
              I
               
              bring
               
              this
               
              fatal
               
              writ
              ,

speaker: TAMORA
text:
The
               
              complot
               
              of
               
              this
               
              timeless
               
              tragedy
              ,

speaker: TAMORA
text:
And
               
              wonder
               
              greatly
               
              that
               
              man’s
               
              face
               
              can
               
              fold

speaker: TAMORA
text:
In
               
              pleasing
               
              smiles
               
              such
               
              murderous
               
              tyranny
              .

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
O
               
              Tamora
              ,
               
              was
               
              ever
               
              heard
               
              the
               
              like
              ?

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
This
               
              is
               
              the
               
              pit
              ,
               
              and
               
              this
               
              the
               
              elder
               
              tree
              .
              —

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Look
              ,
               
              sirs
              ,
               
              if
               
              you
               
              can
               
              find
               
              the
               
              huntsman
               
              out

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
That
               
              should
               
              have
               
              murdered
               
              Bassianus
               
              here
              .

speaker: AARON
text:
My
               
              gracious
               
              lord
              ,
               
              here
               
              is
               
              the
               
              bag
               
              of
               
              gold
              .

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Two
               
              of
               
              thy
               
              whelps
              ,
               
              fell
               
              curs
               
              of
               
              bloody
               
              kind
              ,

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Have
               
              here
               
              bereft
               
              my
               
              brother
               
              of
               
              his
               
              life
              .
              —

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Sirs
              ,
               
              drag
               
              them
               
              from
               
              the
               
              pit
               
              unto
               
              the
               
              prison
              .

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
There
               
              let
               
              them
               
              bide
               
              until
               
              we
               
              have
               
              devised

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Some
               
              never-heard-of
               
              torturing
               
              pain
               
              for
               
              them
              .

speaker: TAMORA
text:
What
              ,
               
              are
               
              they
               
              in
               
              this
               
              pit
              ?
               
              O
               
              wondrous
               
              thing
              !

speaker: TAMORA
text:
How
               
              easily
               
              murder
               
              is
               
              discoverèd
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
High
               
              Emperor
              ,
               
              upon
               
              my
               
              feeble
               
              knee

speaker: TITUS
text:
I
               
              beg
               
              this
               
              boon
               
              with
               
              tears
               
              not
               
              lightly
               
              shed
              ,

speaker: TITUS
text:
That
               
              this
               
              fell
               
              fault
               
              of
               
              my
               
              accursèd
               
              sons
              —

speaker: TITUS
text:
Accursèd
               
              if
               
              the
               
              faults
               
              be
               
              proved
               
              in
               
              them
              —

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
If
               
              it
               
              be
               
              proved
              !
               
              You
               
              see
               
              it
               
              is
               
              apparent
              .

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Who
               
              found
               
              this
               
              letter
              ?
               
              Tamora
              ,
               
              was
               
              it
               
              you
              ?

speaker: TAMORA
text:
Andronicus
               
              himself
               
              did
               
              take
               
              it
               
              up
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
I
               
              did
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ,
               
              yet
               
              let
               
              me
               
              be
               
              their
               
              bail
              ,

speaker: TITUS
text:
For
               
              by
               
              my
               
              father’s
               
              reverend
               
              tomb
               
              I
               
              vow

speaker: TITUS
text:
They
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              ready
               
              at
               
              your
               
              Highness’
               
              will

speaker: TITUS
text:
To
               
              answer
               
              their
               
              suspicion
               
              with
               
              their
               
              lives
              .

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Thou
               
              shalt
               
              not
               
              bail
               
              them
              .
               
              See
               
              thou
               
              follow
               
              me
              .
              —

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Some
               
              bring
               
              the
               
              murdered
               
              body
              ,
               
              some
               
              the
               
              murderers
              .

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
Let
               
              them
               
              not
               
              speak
               
              a
               
              word
              .
               
              The
               
              guilt
               
              is
               
              plain
              .

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
For
              ,
               
              by
               
              my
               
              soul
              ,
               
              were
               
              there
               
              worse
               
              end
               
              than
               
              death
              ,

speaker: SATURNINUS
text:
That
               
              end
               
              upon
               
              them
               
              should
               
              be
               
              executed
              .

speaker: TAMORA
text:
Andronicus
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              entreat
               
              the
               
              King
              .

speaker: TAMORA
text:
Fear
               
              not
               
              thy
               
              sons
              ;
               
              they
               
              shall
               
              do
               
              well
               
              enough
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
Come
              ,
               
              Lucius
              ,
               
              come
              .
               
              Stay
               
              not
               
              to
               
              talk
               
              with
               
              them
              .
